short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extentention what makes active page rainbow on click on extentention icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for make page rainbow! Just go to page what you would like to make rainbow and click on the extension button! Page colors will update every 0.5 seconds! Click again and disco will be stopped.
